item.title: Upcoming Events
item.description: Later dates are more likely to be modified, check messages or this page for latest changes If game changes player count will be at least the previous amount. All players will transfer. If you are no longer interested in the new game just send me a message I’ll take you off list. DATE: FEB 15 2024 HOST: Eric FORMAT: Reserved Sign Up SIGN UPS: Full GAME: Shadows over Camelot
